p: On the other hand, on sterilized soil, no difference was revealed between shoot biomass of inoculated (1.15 g) and non-inoculated (0.85 g) plants, while on non-sterilized soil, shoot biomass was significantly higher for inoculated oregano plants (3.52 g) in comparison with non-inoculated ones (1.59 g) (Fisherâ€™s least significant difference (LSD) test: p < 0.05) ( Table 2).
